toolcard.name: Grozing Pliers
toolcard.description: After drafting increase or decrease the value of the drafted by 1. 1 may not change to 6, or 6 to 1

toolcard.name: Englomise Brush
toolcard.description: Move any one die in your window ignoring the color restrictions. You must obey all other placement restrictions.

toolcard.name: Copper Foil Burnisher
toolcard.description: Move any one die in your window ignoring shade restrictions. You must obey all other placement restrictions.

toolcard.name: Lathekin
toolcard.description: Move exactly two dice, obeying all placement restrictions.

toolcard.name: Lens Cutter
toolcard.description: After drafting, swap the drafted die with a die from the Round Track.

toolcard.name: Flux Brush
toolcard.description: After drafting, re-roll the drafted die. If it cannot be placed return it to the Draft Pool.

toolcard.name: Glazing Hammer
toolcard.description: Re-roll all dice in the Draft Pool. This may only be used on your second turn before drafting.

toolcard.name: Running Pliers
toolcard.description: After your first turn, immediately draft a die. Skip your next turn this round.

toolcard.name: Cork-backed Straightedge
toolcard.description: After drafting, place the die in a spot that is not adjacent to another die. You must obey all other placement restrictions.

toolcard.name: Grinding Stone
toolcard.description: After drafting, flip the die to its opposite side. 6 flips to 1, 5 flips to 2, 4 to 3, etc.

toolcard.name: Flux Remover
toolcard.description: After drafting, return the die to the Dice Bag and pull 1 die from the bag. Choose a value and place the new die, obeying all placement restrictions, or return it to the Draft Pool.

toolcard.name: Tap Wheel
toolcard.description: Move up to two dice of the same color that match the color of a die on the Round Track. You must obey all placement restrictions.
